definitions.definition: The act of participating , of taking part in something.
The state of being related to a larger whole.
The process during which individuals, groups and organizations are consulted about or have the opportunity to become actively involved in a project or program of activity.
examples: a decision made based on the participation of the shareholders

definitions.definition: An ownership interest or profit-sharing right.

main_definition: The act of participating , of taking part in something.
secondary_definitions: The state of being related to a larger whole.
The process during which individuals, groups and organizations are consulted about or have the opportunity to become actively involved in a project or program of activity.
An ownership interest or profit-sharing right.
